entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:27 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of rain or snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to snow this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
